name: Select Oblige
storyline:
Days to win the Glory

Light and darkness, progress and decline, glory and downfall...
Under the distorted order and peace brought by capitalism, there exists a special zone where only a handful of elites monopolize wealth, education, and safety.

A man reaches out from outside this realm.
His name is Nagi Fuwano.
Born and raised in the slums, his life was supposed to be destined as a loser. One day, however, he obtains an invitation to paradise.

【One's Gift】

This is a right granted to just one young person per year, no matter their circumstances, to enroll in "Ogen Academy" an institution where only the elites are allowed to study.

Graduation guarantees immense status, honor, and rights.
As Nagi aims for a reversal of his life, he faces a swirl of negative emotions and schemes directed at this outsider who doesn't belong.
Standing in his way are the extraordinary members of the student council, the rulers of the academy...

Kaname Isshiki, the charismatic president who controls the elite academy and is the head of a noble family secretly ruling Japan.
Eve Tateshina, a trickster who has mastered Aikido and operates on a top-secret mission for the National Police Agency.
Kukuru Yato, a brilliant engineer boasting overwhelming financial power.

Together with his younger sister-figure Tori from the same hometown, Nagi challenges the high society he is completely unfit for, risking everything for survival and glory.
summary: Select Oblige is the latest title from the popular Japanese visual novel brand Madosoft. It features character design and artwork by renowned illustrator Hiyo Yuzuna, with the story crafted by Shoukei Wakaba. The main heroines are voiced by Hana Akino, Kanau, Ren Sagami, and Yuuka Nanakusa.
